value:
Sharena and Anna complimented me
on my swimsuit, but I have yet to see
either of them wearing one.

I won a ticket to an island resort but I
wanted one of my siblings to use it.
They all refused so I wound up going.

Has my swimsuit caught your eye? If
I could take you shopping, I'm sure
we'd find one that suits you perfectly.

I've never seen tropical fish before so
I got this book that's all about them.
Would you like to read it with me?$k$pExperiencing something for the first
time is much better if I can share it
with someone else!

Do you know of any nearby Dragon
Veins? If I find one, I can change
some land into a beach for you.

Sorry to show up in a swimsuit, but
$Nf gave me
a message for you so I rushed out.

What a lovely summer memory.
I'll never forget it!

I'll do my best right up to the end
of summer!

Perhaps my thoughts of the
ocean distracted me...

Thank you! With this, I'll become
stronger than the sun's own rays.

Hello. I'm Corrin. I was resting on a
beach when I heard someone calling
my name. Was that you?

The tropical island was amazing. I
can see the crystal-clear water and
blue sky every time I close my eyes.$k$pI spent so many years cooped up
inside a fortress, so seeing such vivid
colors was a whole new experience.$k$pI had always dreamed of such sights.
I could have spent the rest of my life
just staring out at the water...$k$pBut I'm glad I didn't. I'm glad you
called out to me, and I'm glad I
answered. It allowed us to meet.$k$pSpending time here with you and
making so many new friends are
the perfect summer memories.$k$pThis place is every bit as wonderful as
that island.$k$pOh, here I am just rambling on and
on... Anyone ever tell you you're a
pretty good listener?$k$pWell, I hope you'll tell me about
yourself the next time we get a
chance to talk.
えいっ
それっ！
ええっ！？
Uh oh...
Sink or swim!
Tropical attack!
I'm enjoying this! Are you?
I'll tan your hide!
To the beach.
Heehee
I love to go swimming. Don't you?
I once won a ticket to a tropical island!
I like doing warm-ups before I swim.
I've never had a chance to swim in an ocean before!
So, about this swimsuit... I hope it looks OK.
I wonder what souvenirs I should get for my siblings?
Tropical vacations are fun. Swimming, delicious food...! Do you like all of that too?
Yes?
Whew! So hot!
Fun!
Oh! Are we wearing swimsuits today?
